code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Chat(){const[messages,setMessages]=useState([{from:'bot',text:'Hello! How can I help you with coding today?'}]);const[input,setInput]=useState('');const sendMessage=async()=>{if(!input.trim())return;const userMessage={from:'user',text:input};setMessages(prev=>[...prev,userMessage]);const response=await fetch('http://localhost:3001/api/chat',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({message:input})});const data=await response.json();setMessages(prev=>[...prev,{from:'bot',text:data.reply}]);setInput('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{maxWidth:600,margin:'auto',fontFamily:'sans-serif'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{border:'1px solid #ddd',padding:10,height:400,overflowY:'scroll',marginBottom:10},children:messages.map((m,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{textAlign:m.from==='user'?'right':'left',margin:8},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("b",{children:[m.from,":"]})," ",m.text]},i))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{style:{width:'80%',padding:8},value:input,onChange:e=>setInput(e.target.value),onKeyDown:e=>e.key==='Enter'&&sendMessage(),placeholder:"Ask about coding..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:sendMessage,style:{padding:8},children:"Send"})]});}
